name: Salomon Vaya Powder TS CSWP Winter Boots - Women's
categories: Vaya Powder TS CSWP Winter Boots
description: Warm and waterproof, the Vaya Powder winter boots take on mountain resorts and winter streets with confidence. The high collar keeps out freshly fallen powder, and the winter-specific outsole stays soft and grippy to keep traction on hard packed snow.Tough synthetic uppers with soft collar and rubber toe cap.ClimaSalomon Waterproof (CSWP) bootie tackles wet conditions.Thin, warm, 400g Thinsulate™ Insulation provides warmth for winter days.Synthetic fur lining adds warmth and keeps drafts out.Lace-up closure with gusseted tongue allows for flex in the fit.EnergyCell EVA midsoles combine cushioning and support.Non-marking Winter Contagrip® rubber compound for traction and stability on slippery surfaces.
